Love is in the rrR...  

The idea until the establishment of this group was initiated, conceptualized and executed by Ms Ishveen Kaur. She created a platform to bring together all the leaders and mentors together to create this global workshop. She coordinate between mentors and learners. She take lead  in designing schedule of workshop, coordinating between learners and mentors created outline and responsible for sending information regarding workshops to social platforms on Gmail, WhatApp, and Facebook.  

`Love is in the rrR...` was created to bring together the R coders lovers who wants to start learning R and become an expert in R. The main purpose of this club is to share knowledge and expertise from the expert mentors to the members of this group. Series of online session will be conducted by our mentors on a specific topics from the basic of R to a more advance technique in R. It is our goals that everyone in this group, one day will be an expert and in return be a mentor to the newcomers in R.  

This group is growing rapidly since it first session on July 15, 2022. As of 19 July 2022, we already have 242 members and the numbers are growing.
